author: Sonali Joshi Pitale
title: Did Vidya Balan and Sujoy Ghosh patch-up over coffee?
text:
Vidya Balan and Sujoy Ghosh are rumoured to have ended their year-long tiff; likely to work together soon
Friendships in the film industry are mostly transitory. And the same can be said of fallouts. We hear Vidya Balan and Sujoy Ghosh, who were not on talking terms for a year, patched up a few days ago. To raise a toast to their renewed friendship, the actress has not only agreed to be a part of Sujoy's upcoming production 'TE3N', she also discussed another project with him, suggest sources.

Sujoy Ghosh and Vidya Balan 
"Sujoy and Vidya bumped into each other at a coffee shop recently, but there was no awkwardness between them. They decided to bury the hatchet and got talking. During the course of their chat, they even discussed a couple of projects. Sujoy later arranged a meeting between Vidya and 'TE3N' director Ribhu Dasgupta after she showed interest in the script," adds a source.
The actress will make a special appearance in the film, which stars Amitabh Bachchan and Nawazuddin Siddiqui in pivotal roles. The project is likely to go on floors in Kolkata next month.
Sujoy Ghosh and Vidya Balan were not available for comment.
Breaking point 
Vidya Balan and Sujoy Ghosh had a fallout last year after the actress withdrew from his next, 'Durga Rani Singh' at the eleventh hour citing health issues; grapevine termed it pregnancy but the actress dissed the rumours. Vidya later went on record to admit that she was not on talking terms with the 'Kahaani' director.
Why did these Bollywood actors have a fallout with their mentors?
